title: CASTLE ROCK Season 2 Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment: I'll never look at ice cream the same way again! 🍨 Let me know what you thought about the season below! I love reading theories :)
In the letter, Joy said she was talking to a lawyer and Henry Deaver is a lawyer. Coincidence? Maybe... maybe not...

This was much more satisfying ending than season one BUT still a bit rushed IMHO. Nadia deserved a better resolution to her story than her last scene provided. The ending for Annie and Joy was perfect because it paralleled her almost drowning Joy as a baby. We needed one more episode so they could have given 30-40 minutes on resolving both story arcs.
I really wanted her to tell pop “I love you” also! 😭

This is the best season of castle rock. 

The ending was quite sad I think the lead actress deserves a golden globe
description:
In this video we break down the season finale of Castle Rock Season 2 and unravel all its unanswered questions including Joy/Amity, the Kid, and Annie's connection to Misery.
